name: @eduardoac/api-clients-monorepo
description: Monorepo with API client templates (Orval + Kubb) and the multi-client CLI.

scripts.build: npm run build --workspace @eduardoac/orval-api-client-template && npm run build --workspace @eduardoac/kubb-api-client-template && npm run build --workspace @eduardoac/generate-api-client
scripts.build:template: npm run build --workspace @eduardoac/orval-api-client-template && npm run build --workspace @eduardoac/kubb-api-client-template
scripts.build:cli: npm run build --workspace @eduardoac/orval-api-client-template && npm run build --workspace @eduardoac/kubb-api-client-template && npm run build --workspace @eduardoac/generate-api-client
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace @eduardoac/orval-api-client-template && npm run test --workspace @eduardoac/kubb-api-client-template && npm run test --workspace @eduardoac/generate-api-client
